name: BusinessStandardBusinessNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Business Standard business news briefing provides you with the latest and most relevant business headlines of the hour. Included in the feed besides the headline is a short description about the event where relevant. Updated through the business hours of the day, this is a great way to keep one updated on the latest in the world of business and finance.
